sections.heading: device lessor, defined.Assistive device lessor means a person who leases an assistive device to a consumer under a written lease or who holds the lessor's rights under a written lease

sections.text:
69-2605.Assistive device lessor, defined.

Assistive device lessor means a person who leases an assistive device to a consumer under a written lease or who holds the lessor's rights under a written lease.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 802, ยง 5.
